The user below me also got ninja'd

Partially true. I have a full-stock copy along with a heavily modded one.

The user below me has encountered a grammar naz! on those forums.

Nope. I'm a complete n00b at grammar (probably because non native English speaker), but I never encountered any grammar naz!s here (yet).

The user below me hacks Chicago. (I mean, virtually, huh)

nope i m only a Qhackjob

False, I like fiber optics.

true & the userbelow could be the user above

But the user below me might be the user two posts above me.

.

.

No. Just no.

The user below me is a human.

Opinions vary.

The user below me has a friend they've known their whole life.

False. Most of them left me.

The user below me likes creating debris in their save.

False. I terminate all the debris.

The user below me is a user below me.

Absolutely true!

The user below me has a Kessler syndrome in his apartment.

Yep, I have a messy room

The user below me never uses SRBs in KSP.

I like to think I am capable of a rocket without SRBs, but in reality...

The user below me likes trains.

I don't like trains. They are loud and irritating and inefficient.

The user below me has a pet cat.

Yes. Her name is Danika.

The user below me thinks Poland can into space. (Double points if you get the reference.)

TRUE! POLAND INTO SPACE! TWO SATELLISTES!

true

True.

Eh, I'm not too bad.

too true
